formula: a(n+1) = 2a(n)-a([(n-2)/2]) starting with a(1)=1 and a(2)=3 (a(n)=0 if n<1). Also a(n)=A062178(n+2)-2. - Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Feb 23 2008
